thread.title: Win a Walt Disney World family holiday and cruise
thread.title_full: Win a Walt Disney World family holiday and cruise - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a Walt Disney World family holiday and cruise
text: How would you like to experience the ultimate Disney family holiday for up to four people? Enter the prize draw and you could be jetting off to enjoy all the fun and excitement of the celebrated Walt Disney World Resort in Orlando, Florida – with a three-night full-board Disney Cruise and Disney Gift Card thrown in for good measure. Featuring return economy flights to Orlando plus return airport transfers within the USA, this amazing prize package also includes: Walt Disney World Seven nights' accommodation in one family room at a Walt Disney World Resort hotel on a room-only basis Up to four eight-day Walt Disney World Magic Your Way Tickets with Park Hopper® & Water Parks, Fun & More Options providing entrance to all six Disney Parks $2,500 Disney Gift Card to cover meals while in Walt Disney World Resort in Florida Transfers from the Walt Disney World Hotel to Port Canaveral Disney Cruise Three nights' accommodation on board the Disney Dream in one stateroom on a full-board basis Pre-paid gratuities, government taxes, fees, and port expenses are included All you have to do to be in with a chance of scooping this dream holiday is enter your details on the form below before midnight on 18 October 2015. Online Form - Win the Ultimate Disney Holiday
